full_summary:
# Retender EZ899-231731 Chase RCMP Detachment New Generator

## Tender Details

* **Tender Reference Number:** WS3899788119-Doc3933694220
* **Tender Solicitation Number:** WS3899788111
* **Publication Date:** March 27, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** April 11, 2023 at 14:00 EDT

## Amendments
This tender amendment cancels and supersedes the previous tender solicitation, number WS389978911 dated March 7, 2023, with a closing time of March 21, 2023 at 14:00 EDT. We will provide a debriefing or feedback session upon request to bidders who submitted offers for the previous solicitation.

## Tender Description
Public Services and Procurement Canada, on behalf of the Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP), invites you to bid on a contract to install a new generator at the Chase RCMP detachment in Chase, British Columbia. The project involves modification of the existing electrical distribution system, and replacement or addition of associated electrical equipment. The work includes the general construction of a new exterior rated sound-attenuated generator, Automatic Transfer Switch (ATS), primary and secondary feeders located at the Chase RCMP Detachment.

## Eligibility and Selection Criteria
This tender is open to all qualified bidders. The selection criteria are as follows:
* Lowest price

## Tender Specifications
* **Procurement Category:** Construction
* **Notice Type:** Invitation to Qualify
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive Selective Tendering
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Delivery:** British Columbia, Canada

## Contact Information
* **Contact Name:** Lana Hunt, SPAC/PSPC
* **Email Address:** [lana.hunt@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:lana.hunt@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Phone Number:** Not provided
* **Fax Number:** Not provided

## Notice URL and Attachments
Please visit the following URL to access the tender notice and supporting documents:
* **Notice URL:** [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15803795?extsite=MTU4MDM3OTVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15803795?extsite=MTU4MDM3
